title.bibl: Skandinaven, Apr. 19, 1919. New First Swedish Methodist Episcopal Church Dedicated

div.bibl: Skandinaven (Daily Edition), Apr. 19, 1919. NEW FIRST SWEDISH METHODIST EPISCOPAL CHURCH DEDICATED

body.p: The new First Swedish Methodist Episcopal Church was dedicated last Sunday. The new Church is located on the corner of North Paulina Street and Highland Avenue.
The Reverend Emeritus Alfred Anderson officiated.
Present were: the district superintendent, Reverend W. C. Blomquist, and Reverend C. J. Erickson.
